name: Tanetsuke de Hame Ana Kagu ni Naru Namaiki Ojou-sama-tachi: Joshi Ryou o Harama Seifuku! Shirokujichuu Gokujou Mesu Niku ni Tsutsumarete Zaajiru Suteru Dake no Seikatsu
summary:
In this visual novel, the dormitory for conceited rich girls becomes your warehouse of
accessible human furniture for your pleasures every day and night!
